headline: PPG Industries Stock: Analyst Estimates & Ratings
summary: Despite PPG Industries' underperformance relative to the broader market over the past year, Wall Street analysts maintain a moderately optimistic outlook about the stock’s prospects.

headline: PPG recognized in Newsweek’s America’s Greatest Companies 2025 list
summary: PITTSBURGH, August 20, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced that it has been named to Newsweek magazine’s inaugural America’s Greatest Companies 2025 list. The list recognizes 650 U.S. companies that are operating at the highest caliber when it comes to business performance.
